buildCommand: cd ../warren && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install && cd ../admin-portal && echo 'DEBUG: package.json content:' && head -30 package.json && echo 'DEBUG: package.json size:' && wc -l package.json && echo 'DEBUG: checking for tailwindcss in package.json:' && grep tailwindcss package.json || echo 'tailwindcss not found in package.json!' && rm -rf node_modules && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm ls --depth=0 | grep tailwind && npm run build:standalone
